Xuan Zang, Possibly China's Greatest Translator
trans-unit.target: Xuan Zang, probablemente el traductor más importante de China

alt-trans.source: Xuan Zang, Possibly China's Greatest Translator
alt-trans.target: Xuan Zang, probablemente el traductor más importante de China

trans-unit.source: <b><i>His 10-stage quality control process initiated more than 1300 years ago is far more thorough and exacting than any existing today.

alt-trans.source: His 10-stage quality control process initiated more than 1300 years ago is far more thorough and exacting than any existing today.
alt-trans.target: El proceso de control de calidad en diez pasos que inició hace más de 1300 años es mucho más completo y preciso que los que existen en la actualidad.

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: Introducción

trans-unit.source: Every Chinese, young and old, within and outside China, knows the classical language rendering of the exploits of Xuan Zang, the pious Tang dynasty monk and his three storybook disciples:
the indestructible Monkey King, the Great Sage; Brother Pig, the Eight Denials (of Buddhism) and Sand Monk, the third disciple.
In real life, Xuan Zang was a truly remarkable Buddhist monk.

alt-trans.source: In real life, Xuan Zang was a truly remarkable Buddhist monk.
alt-trans.target: En la vida real, Xuan Zang fue un monje budista realmente excepcional.

trans-unit.source: He travelled on land on the way through hostile and uncharted territory to the birthplace of Buddha in the Indian sub-continent and returned to Chang’an (modern day Xi’an) with a set of Buddhist sutras.

alt-trans.source: He traveled on land on the way through hostile and uncharted territory to the birthplace of Buddha in the Indian sub-continent and returned to Chang'an (modern day Xi'an) with a set of Buddhist sutras.
alt-trans.target: Emprendió un largo camino a través de territorios hostiles e inexplorados y llegó finalmente al lugar de nacimiento de Buda, en el subcontinente indio.

trans-unit.source: The voluminous set of sutras was written in the extremely difficult Sanskrit language.

alt-trans.source: The voluminous set of sutras was written in the extremely difficult Sanskrit language.
alt-trans.target: Cuando regresó a Chang'an (actualmente Xi'an), llevaba una colección de sutras budistas escritos en sánscrito, lengua extremadamente difícil.

trans-unit.source: Together with his doyens of pupils, he completed the translation of some 75 volumes of the sutras into the equally difficult Chinese languages
trans-unit.target: Con la ayuda de sus discípulos más veteranos, tradujo unos 75 volúmenes de sutras a las no menos difíciles lenguas chinas.

alt-trans.source: Together with his doyens of pupils, he completed the translation of some 75 volumes of the sutras into the equally difficult Chinese languages
alt-trans.target: Con la ayuda de sus discípulos más veteranos, tradujo unos 75 volúmenes de sutras a las no menos difíciles lenguas chinas.

trans-unit.source: The 10 Stages
trans-unit.target: Los 10 pasos

trans-unit.source: Buddhist sutras translated into Chinese prior the Tang dynasty were difficult to comprehend because the first translators were Buddhist monks of non-Han Chinese origin.
trans-unit.target: Las traducciones de los sutras budistas al chino, anteriores a la dinastía Tang, resultaban difíciles de comprender porque sus autores habían sido monjes budistas que no eran de origen Han.

alt-trans.source: Buddhist sutras translated into Chinese prior the Tang dynasty were difficult to comprehend because the first translators were Buddhist monks of non-Han Chinese origin.
alt-trans.target: Las traducciones de los sutras budistas al chino, anteriores a la dinastía Tang, resultaban difíciles de comprender porque sus autores habían sido monjes budistas que no eran de origen Han.

trans-unit.source: It took China several hundred years to bring forth a selection of Buddhist monks who could master both the Sanskrit language as well as the complex Buddhism doctrines, which were written in Sanskrit.

alt-trans.source: It took China several hundred years to bring forth a selection of Buddhist monks who could master both the Sanskrit language as well as the complex Buddhism doctrines, which were written in Sanskrit.
alt-trans.target: Tuvieron que transcurrir varios siglos para que se formase en China un grupo de monjes que dominasen a la vez las complejas doctrinas budistas y el sánscrito, lengua en la que estaban escritas.

trans-unit.source: And Xuan Zang was recognised as foremost among them.

alt-trans.source: And Xuan Zang was recognized as foremost among them.
alt-trans.target: Xuan Zang, considerado el representante más eminente,

trans-unit.source: He was appointed chief of the Tang dynasty imperial translation centre.

alt-trans.source: He was appointed chief of the Tang dynasty imperial translation center.
alt-trans.target: fue nombrado director del centro imperial de traducción de la dinastía Tang.

trans-unit.source: It was he who designed and implemented a translation workflow that would guarantee the quality of the final product.

alt-trans.source: It was he who designed and implemented a translation workflow that would guarantee the quality of the final product.
alt-trans.target: Él fue quien creó, y más tarde implantó, un método de trabajo que garantizaría la calidad del producto final.

trans-unit.source: The process detailed below is well worth adopting by any modern day translation team.

alt-trans.source: The process detailed below is well worth adopting by any modern day translation team.
alt-trans.target: Este proceso, que se detalla a continuación, podría ser perfectamente aplicable a cualquier equipo de traducción de nuestros días.

trans-unit.source: Stage 1
trans-unit.target: Paso 1

trans-unit.source: Master translator and Buddhism expert to jointly study and interpret the original text written in Sanskrit.
trans-unit.target: El experto en sánscrito y el experto en budismo trabajan conjuntamente en el estudio y la interpretación del texto original sánscrito.

alt-trans.source: Master translator and Buddhism expert to jointly study and interpret the original text written in Sanskrit.
alt-trans.target: El experto en sánscrito y el experto en budismo trabajan conjuntamente en el estudio y la interpretación del texto original sánscrito.

trans-unit.source: It could involve one or more persons.

alt-trans.source: It could involve one or more persons.
alt-trans.target: En este paso pueden participar una o varias personas más.

trans-unit.source: Stage 2
trans-unit.target: Paso 2

trans-unit.source: All members of the translation team to attend a recital of the text in question by the Master translator.
trans-unit.target: Todos los miembros del equipo traductor asisten a un recital del texto en cuestión, ofrecido por el traductor experto.

alt-trans.source: All members of the translation team to attend a recital of the text in question by the Master translator.
alt-trans.target: Todos los miembros del equipo traductor asisten a un recital del texto en cuestión, ofrecido por el traductor experto.

trans-unit.source: The purpose is to verify the accuracy of the interpretation undertaken in Stage 1.

alt-trans.source: The purpose is to verify the accuracy of the interpretation undertaken in Stage 1.
alt-trans.target: La finalidad de esta etapa es comprobar que en el paso 1 se haya interpretado correctamente el texto.

trans-unit.source: A recital is necessary because the scriptures were originally written for recitation.

alt-trans.source: A recital is necessary because the scriptures were originally written for recitation.
alt-trans.target: Su lectura en voz alta es necesaria puesto que, en su origen, las escrituras fueron concebidas para ser recitadas.

trans-unit.source: Stage 3
trans-unit.target: Paso 3

trans-unit.source: A team of junior translators produces the first Chinese draft of the Sanskrit text.

alt-trans.source: A team of junior translators produces the first Chinese draft of the Sanskrit text.
alt-trans.target: Un equipo de traductores principiantes redacta en chino el primer esbozo del texto original en sánscrito.

trans-unit.source: The draft is a combination of transliteration of Sanskrit terms and standard Chinese.

alt-trans.source: The draft is a combination of transliteration of Sanskrit terms and standard Chinese.
alt-trans.target: El borrador es una combinación de transliteración de términos sánscritos y términos de chino estándar.

trans-unit.source: Stage 4
trans-unit.target: Paso 4

trans-unit.source: Production of a complete Chinese version by a senior native Chinese Buddhist monk trained to undertake scripture translation.
trans-unit.target: Un monje budista experto, cuyo idioma materno es el chino, formado para emprender la traducción de las escrituras, realiza la versión completa en chino.

alt-trans.source: Production of a complete Chinese version by a senior native Chinese Buddhist monk trained to undertake scripture translation.
alt-trans.target: Un monje budista experto, cuyo idioma materno es el chino, formado para emprender la traducción de las escrituras, realiza la versión completa en chino.

trans-unit.source: This is the most important stage in the entire process and it must be undertaken by a monk with an in-depth knowledge of Chinese culture and language.
trans-unit.target: Éste es el paso más importante del proceso y su realización debe confiarse a un monje con amplios conocimientos de la lengua y la cultura chinas.

alt-trans.source: This is the most important stage in the entire process and it must be undertaken by a monk with an in-depth knowledge of Chinese culture and language.
alt-trans.target: Éste es el paso más importante del proceso y su realización debe confiarse a un monje con amplios conocimientos de la lengua y la cultura chinas.

trans-unit.source: Stage 5
trans-unit.target: Paso 5

trans-unit.source: Refinement of sentence structure of the complete Chinese version.

alt-trans.source: Refinement of sentence structure of the complete Chinese version.
alt-trans.target: Se perfecciona la estructura de las frases de la versión china completa.

trans-unit.source: This is a necessary stage because of the vast linguistic differences between the source and target language.
trans-unit.target: Este paso es necesario debido a la gran divergencia lingüística entre los idiomas de origen y de destino.

alt-trans.source: This is a necessary stage because of the vast linguistic differences between the source and target language.
alt-trans.target: Este paso es necesario debido a la gran divergencia lingüística entre los idiomas de origen y de destino.

trans-unit.source: Stage 6
Reverse translation of the Chinese version into Sanskrit in order to verify the accuracy of the interpretation of the original text.
trans-unit.target: La versión china se somete a una traducción inversa al sánscrito, con el fin de verificar que el texto original se haya interpretado con la máxima exactitud.

alt-trans.source: Reverse translation of the Chinese version into Sanskrit in order to verify the accuracy of the interpretation of the original text.
alt-trans.target: La versión china se somete a una traducción inversa al sánscrito, con el fin de verificar que el texto original se haya interpretado con la máxima exactitud.

trans-unit.source: Mistakes in interpretation are to be promptly rectified in the Chinese version.

alt-trans.source: Mistakes in interpretation are to be promptly rectified in the Chinese version.
alt-trans.target: Los errores de interpretación se rectifican inmediatamente en la versión china.

trans-unit.source: Stage 7
trans-unit.target: Paso 7

trans-unit.source: Review of the verified Chinese version to identify errors in character usage, and refinement of linguistic expressions to improve readability.
trans-unit.target: Se revisa la versión china validada para detectar posibles errores en el uso de los caracteres y pulir las expresiones lingüísticas de modo que el texto resulte más legible.

alt-trans.source: Review of the verified Chinese version to identify errors in character usage, and refinement of linguistic expressions to improve readability.
alt-trans.target: Se revisa la versión china validada para detectar posibles errores en el uso de los caracteres y pulir las expresiones lingüísticas de modo que el texto resulte más legible.

trans-unit.source: Stage 8
trans-unit.target: Paso 8

trans-unit.source: Further polishing to improve the literary beauty of the language and adding colours to the otherwise monotonous writings.
trans-unit.target: Nueva revisión para mejorar la belleza literaria de la lengua y dar un toque de color a los textos de lectura monótona.

alt-trans.source: Further polishing to improve the literary beauty of the language and adding colors to the otherwise monotonous writings.
alt-trans.target: Nueva revisión para mejorar la belleza literaria de la lengua y dar un toque de color a los textos de lectura monótona.

trans-unit.source: Stage 9
trans-unit.target: Paso 9

trans-unit.source: Verification of the audio quality by reciting the translation aloud.

alt-trans.source: Verification of the audio quality by reciting the translation aloud.
alt-trans.target: Comprobación de la musicalidad del texto mediante lectura en voz alta de la traducción.

trans-unit.source: The audio effect is important because scriptures are meant for preaching to an audience.

alt-trans.source: The audio effect is important because scriptures are meant for preaching to an audience.
alt-trans.target: El aspecto auditivo es importante, puesto que las oraciones serán recitadas en público.

trans-unit.source: Stage 10
trans-unit.target: Paso 10

trans-unit.source: Final check by the Master Translator.
trans-unit.target: Revisión final por parte del traductor experto.

alt-trans.source: Final check by the Master Translator.
alt-trans.target: Revisión final por parte del traductor experto.

trans-unit.source: Conclusion
trans-unit.target: Conclusión

trans-unit.source: Xuan Zang did a great job in the translation of the Buddhist sutras.

alt-trans.source: Xuan Zang did a great job in the translation of the Buddhist sutras.
alt-trans.target: Xuan Zang elaboró una traducción extraordinaria de los sutras budistas.

trans-unit.source: He was able to excel not only was he an outstanding linguist but also he was wholeheartedly committed to the task as a devoted Buddhist with an extraordinary understanding of its contents.

alt-trans.source: He was able to excel not only was he an outstanding linguist but also he was wholeheartedly committed to the task as a devoted Buddhist with an extraordinary understanding of its contents.
alt-trans.target: Demostró que no sólo era un lingüista excepcional, sino también un budista devoto que se volcó en cuerpo y alma en un cometido que conocía a fondo.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he dedicated thirteen years of his life to the task.

alt-trans.source: Indeed, he dedicated thirteen years of his life to the task.
alt-trans.target: Dedicó trece años a su gran obra,

trans-unit.source: And the task was not simply transforming one language into another.

alt-trans.source: And the task was not simply transforming one language into another.
alt-trans.target: que no se limitaba a transformar una lengua en otra,

trans-unit.source: In order to effectively spread Buddhism, the sutras in Chinese would have to be understood by the Chinese devotees.

alt-trans.source: In order to effectively spread Buddhism, the sutras in Chinese would have to be understood by the Chinese devotees.
alt-trans.target: puesto que para difundir el budismo el único medio era que los devotos chinos comprendieran los sutras.

trans-unit.source: In other words, he had to take into account the marketplace.

alt-trans.source: In other words, he had to take into account the marketplace.
alt-trans.target: En otras palabras: debía tener en cuenta el mercado.

trans-unit.source: Was it intended for the gentry for whom Buddhism depended for their financial support or was it for the less literate general populace to widen market share or was it for both?
trans-unit.target: ¿Su esfuerzo iba dirigido a la elite, de cuyo apoyo económico dependía el budismo, o a un pueblo menos culto, lo que permitiría ampliar la cota de mercado? ¿O tal vez a ambos?

alt-trans.source: Was it intended for the gentry for whom Buddhism depended for their financial support or was it for the less literate general populace to widen market share or was it for both?
alt-trans.target: ¿Su esfuerzo iba dirigido a la elite, de cuyo apoyo económico dependía el budismo, o a un pueblo menos culto, lo que permitiría ampliar la cota de mercado? ¿O tal vez a ambos?
